body.name: O-Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop Microfiber Refill (Pack of 4)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 4 mins
features: 4 GENUINE O-CEDAR MOP HEAD REPLACEMENTS: Get the most from your O-Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop System with genuine O-Cedar mop head refills that are designed for optimal floor cleaning performance. Includes 4 genuine O-Cedar EasyWring Refills.

REMOVES OVER 99% OF BACTERIA: Genuine O-Cedar mop heads remove over 99% of bacteria using only water. They don't need bleach or detergent. Bleach can harm microfiber, but O-Cedar Floor Cleaning PACS won't. PACS help to remove grease and dirt from hard floors, to give you an even deeper clean. * BMA Labor GbR Labs tested O-Cedar EasyWring refills on May 3, 2019. The tests confirmed the effectiveness of the refills. This claim remains accurate and true today.

SAFE TO USE ON ALL HARD FLOOR SURFACES: The fibers easily remove and absorb tough dirt and grime on all floor surfaces, leaving no streaks behind on finished hardwood, laminate, ceramic tile, vinyl, linoleum and more.
MACHINE WASHABLE & REUSABLE: The replacement mop head can be machine washed and reused again and again saving you cleaning time and money. Keep an extra refill handy for the next mess.
COMPATIBLE ONLY WITH EASYWRING SYSTEM: Designed for the EasyWring Spin Mop and Bucket System. Mop head NOT compatible with RinseClean System.
body.description: O-Cedar's EasyWring Spin Mop refill effectively and safely removes dirt and grime with just water! Each mop refill has hundreds of soft absorbing 100% microfiber strands that will not damage or scratch your hardwood or tiled floors. Our refills are machine washable and reusable. The triangle mop head design allows users to clean corners and hard-to-reach places. Refills can be used wet or dry to mop or dust hard surfaces making them a versatile cleaning product. To remove refill, step on microfiber strands and pull mop handle up to separate base from mop head. To replace refill, align microfiber mop head with base and push down until it snaps securely in place. To wash, machine or hand wash and lay flat to dry.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love my spin mop!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set on sale. I love using my spin mop for easy clean up. The heads pop off easily, they are machine washable, and it is easy to replace a new mop head. I have been using this brand for several years.

reviews.reviewText: I like these mio heads. They are easy to use and the mop and bucket system makes quick work of wringing excess water. I wash them after use with some oxi-clean in the washer and air dry. After a few months, it’s nice and affordable to switch them for new ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mop ever!
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying that I own a high-end cleaning company and have tried many mops through the years and this is by far the best I've had! I have used the O'Ceder mop and bucket for over 5 years now for my Aromatherapy cleaning business. I have gone through two in 5 years. Let me just say this to all the negative reviews... "YOU MUST WASH MOP HEADS BEFORE FIRST USE".These are microfiber and like anything "microfiber" they have a natural oil base which makes them feel yucky at first. Causing them to smear, smug, "flip an flop" (or stick to rough surfaces like stone or other rough tiles, etc.) and basically if they're not washed first, they are not going to work very well.With that said, I have been using this mop and bucket and all my customers have purchased one just to have it because they love the results when I am done cleaning their home. I am super anal about streaks on the floor and in my business, it is important to "never leave behind a film". And I hate having to go back and wipe up smudges on my hands and knees! Let me also add, that I clean high-end RV's with super shiny marble flooring and I never have any issues as I have seen some of these reviews claim.Here are a few tips and tricks I've learned through the years that will help you avoid some of the mentioned...HOW TO USE THIS MOP FOR MAXIMUM RESULTS:1. Vacuum floor thoroughly. (This is probably the most important step that people skimp on) How dirty is your floor after you vacuum? You may want to get an industrial mop for filthy cleaning jobs. Although I have done some really bad floors with this mop and it never failed me!2. Always wash your new mop heads before your first use and after major cleanings.3. Always use HOT water when you mop your floors. The hotter the water the better results you'll get. Think "STERILIZE WITH STEAM"4. Spray the floor with cleaner and then mop over with your HOT, wet microfiber O'Ceder mop.5. Be sure to spin all access water off! (Pump the pedal 3-5x's at least) This helps deliver smooth strokes across the floor, and also helps with the prevention of access of water in cracks that could cause mildew.By doing the above process you will see a shine like no other and you will LOVE LOVE LOVE Your O'Ceder mop just as much as I do! Hope this helps you all!
Excelente, los puedes lavar en lavadora, son muy prácticos
Very good product. Long-lasting and wipes the floor well.

reviews.reviewTitle: MUY BUEN PRODUCTO. ES FUNCIONAL AL 100X100. LA RECOMIENDO!
reviews.reviewText: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO. FÁCIL PARA TRAPEAR. SE LAVA FÁCILMENTE. ENTRA POR TODOS LOS RINCONES Y DEBAJO DE LA MUEBLES SIN MAYOR DIFICULTAD O ESFUERZO. AUNQUE LA FREGONA ES CHICA DE DIÁMETRO, CUMPLE CON SU FUNCIÓN. Y NO TE TARDAS MUCHO TIEMPO EN TRAPEAR UN DEPTO DE 180MTS CUADRADOS. SE EXPRIME SOLA LA FREGONA. ESTOY FASCINADA. LA SUPERRECOMIENDO
